Description: The following statement contains a magic number: for (; nByte < nEnd; nByte++) {  	pChecksum ^= pByte [nByte];  	for (nBit = 0; nBit < 8; nBit++) {  		if ((pChecksum & 0x1) == 1) {  			nShiftedBit = 1;  		}  		else {  			nShiftedBit = 0;  		}  		pChecksum >>= 1;  		if (nShiftedBit != 0) {  			pChecksum ^= 0xA001;  		}  	}  }

The following statement contains a magic number: for (nBit = 0; nBit < 8; nBit++) {  	if ((pChecksum & 0x1) == 1) {  		nShiftedBit = 1;  	}  	else {  		nShiftedBit = 0;  	}  	pChecksum >>= 1;  	if (nShiftedBit != 0) {  		pChecksum ^= 0xA001;  	}  }
